TopicTitle: My first orbital docking & interplanetary ship built.

Articles.Content:
Oh im so happy, i finally got the hang of docking in orbit! And did it whilst building a ship in space! Jebediah would be proud

Here's my pics :

This is the second stage, the first was already in orbit. You can see the main stage not far off.

Starting to line up the ships:

TaDaaaaaa!!! One interplanetary ship complete with rovers, probes, science lab and a lander.
Congrats! Orbital docking is an important milestone.

Congrats! Orbital docking is an important milestone.

Thankyou. So pleased, however the design was flawed and wobbled like crazy, to the point i couldnt pilot it. Back to the drawing board!
